products.title: Daytona, Boutique Cream - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in boutique cream offers a classic cream shade on a durable faux wood that you'd be hard-pressed to tell apart from the real thing. Choose from the traditional full height style, the unique caf style, and the versatile tier on tier style. Surround the boutique cream with soft mauves and lavenders for a relaxing and serene ambience in your master bedroom or even living room. Or, opt for a pretty pastel pink bathroom look, adding rose pinks to the lovely cream of the shutter.

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. This splash dove grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior.

products.title: Splash Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This cream electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Make light work of light control in your home with this electric operated roller blind. The streamlined, simple to use design is a luxurious modern convenience and is not only suitable for any room but is easy to care for too. The cream colourway brings an uplifting touch to the look and is so versatile. Team with pretty pastels or rich classic colours for an eye-catching contrast. products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Recycled Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
